name: Nike Air Max 1 "Anniversary Edition"
description: Celebrating the 30th anniversary of the Air Max 1, this limited edition features a classic red and white colorway with a retro look.

name: Adidas UltraBoost 21 "Pride Edition"
description: A colorful take on the UltraBoost 21, designed to celebrate diversity and inclusion with vibrant hues and a sleek design.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star "Year of the Dragon"
description: These limited edition Chuck Taylors feature intricate dragon embroidery to celebrate the Lunar New Year.
imageURL: /product_images/Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Year of the Dragon.jpg

name: New Balance 550 "White/Green"
description: A retro-inspired sneaker that combines classic white leather with green accents, paying homage to the 1980s basketball style.

name: Air Jordan 1 "Travis Scott"
description: A highly sought-after collaboration with rapper Travis Scott, featuring a unique reverse Swoosh design and premium suede.

name: Yeezy Boost 350 V2 "Zebra"
description: Known for its distinctive black and white stripe pattern, this Yeezy Boost 350 V2 is a limited edition with high resale value.

name: Nike SB Dunk Low "Syracuse"
description: A nod to the Syracuse University colors, this Nike SB Dunk Low features an orange and white color scheme with premium materials.

name: Puma RS-X3 "Puzzle Pack"
description: This sneaker features a bold and colorful design inspired by puzzle pieces, combining vibrant colors with a chunky silhouette.
